name: Mark Daly-Gunter
what_you_do: Shadow Work® for Businesses and Organizations provides coaching, tools, and training to enhance personal and organizational effectiveness by applying personal growth principles in the workplace.
who_you_serve: They serve businesses and organizations looking to improve team dynamics and individual effectiveness through structured coaching and training.
business_focus: Shadow Work® for Businesses and Organizations provides coaching, tools, and training to enhance personal and organizational effectiveness by applying personal growth principles in the workplace. (organizational coaching)
